thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Elizabeth Sargent

author: Elizabeth Sargent
title: Elizabeth Sargent
text:
We recently went on a trip to Melbourne to visit family and required a car, so looked on line and the cheapest by far was Rentalcars.com.
Of course we read the reviews etc - and we went ahead and booked our car.
We arrived in Melbourne and set about to find our bus to the car rental which was about 10 minutes drive from the airport. This is our one and only criticism - we weren't told who our courtesy bus was with. We were looking for Rentalcars.com, and then were looking for Ace Rentals (who our car was with). It was only because another friendly bus-driver (plenty of them aren't!) told us that our courtesy bus was Busy Beaver that we were able to get to our car minutes before they closed for the day and we wouldn't have been able to pick up our car!!
We had seen 2 Busy Beaver buses stop, pick up people and go right in front of us.
Apart from that one thing, the people at Ace were fantastic. Polite and efficient and our car was wonderful. It was clean, newish and economical to run, comfortable and was just perfect really.
Dropping car back was seamless.
We would not hesitate to book again using this service - especially now that we know which bus to get on!
